attributes.action: Make study leave for Year 11 students 3-months long in 2017 so they can revise!
attributes.additional_details: Students do not have enough time to revise, for those who like revising alone, for those who seek help from teachers should be able to go into school and work with teachers and those who find it more helpful and want to work at home can.
attributes.background: Current study leave is not a long enough time for students to revise as it usually starts about the time of the first exam (RE). Study leave should start in April around the time of the (end of term holidays) or even the start of April/ end of March.

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of individual schools. You could raise this issue with your school's governing body.
